website_summaries.verdict: The original flavor of the Lay's Kettle Cooked chip provides a high quality crispy chip you may mistake for a gourmet brand.
pros: Seems to stay fresher than the regular style
Good taste of potato without anything overpowering or changing the natural flavor
cons: Doesn't have a strong flavor like some other chips

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, THEE best chip on the planet.
customer_reviews.text: All those flavored chips are repulsive to me. If you can't make a straightforward great tasting potato chip--all the flavor add-ins in history WILL NOT MAKE IT GOOD. This is the only plain original proper tasting potato chip I have found, so far. I have tried ALL. They are a waste of time and money. They leave a rancid oil aftertaste. Lays kettle cooked never has, not in any bag I tasted.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Ruined by poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips and was excited to receive them, but Amazon's packaging kind of ruined them. While the flavor was the same great taste, Amazon had punctured a small hole in the bag in order to make the bag fit in the box and the chips were stale when they arrived. This has happened twice now, the other time with another brand. I don't advise ordering chips through Amazon. However, these chips are typically very good with that extra crunch that Kettle Cooked chips often provide. I would just stick to purchasing these at your local supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Love Lays Flaming Hot, these don't measure up
customer_reviews.text: I love Lays flaming hot chips and I love kettle chips so I thought these would be a perfect combination. Unfortunately these do not live up to either. Normal flamin hots have almost a sweetness to them, that is completely absent here. Instead they have an overpowering saltiness and a slight unpleasant bitterness that is very similar to Ruffles flamin hot chips. If you love those you might like these as well but they don't taste like normal Lays brand.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Big Crunch and just enough that you don’t overdo
customer_reviews.text: My new got to have snack that sometimes is supper, I can drink a coke and eat a whole bag of these, the only downfall is that for the price,, like everything else, is that the bag only feels and is half full, so little expensive unless on sale. I love the folded and great crispy crunch of these , would love more salt on them instead of sea salt ,,
customer_reviews.author: jeremy191

customer_reviews.title: Better than Tim’s chips !
customer_reviews.text: This was a good product and much better than “Tim’s Chips” jalepenos which I got at the same time. Tim’s has turned out to be a hit or miss. About 1/10 bags will just have way too much seasoning. Have never had that problem with these Lays chips. You will still want a large French onion dip to make it even better tho. Resers sucks tho. Get western Family only for the dip. Even deans sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Ididnothavesexwiththatwoman

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic excuse for a "kettle" chip
customer_reviews.text: What's going on with all of the potato chip brands thinning out their "kettle" chips? It seems like over the past few years they've been getting thinner and thinner. I just did a personal taste test of 3 different brands of kettle chips (this being one of them) and none of them satisfied me. They were all just a hair thicker than regular potato chips. Where did all the thick, REAL kettle chips go to? Even Kettle brand kettle chips didn't make the cut My search continues...
customer_reviews.author: Mark K

customer_reviews.title: Hard to stop eating once you start.
customer_reviews.text: These taste wonderful, price is cheaper than costco, they are a wonderful crunchy with jalapeno flavor. Gave one star for portion because a portion is the whole bag for me. I don't care to much for the amazon pantry due to shipping fee that could take some getting use to if at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bjean

customer_reviews.title: Chips boxed w/ liquid Laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 210 oz & a 122 oz of laundry liquid detergent, also 4 bags of Lays Potato chips. Why would Amazon pack chips with detergent; the weight smashed all the bags of chips & allowed the weight to shift; much less when you go to grocery, chips are in their own bag like, eggs or bread to prevent cross contamination in shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: 2 of 5 bags edible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 5 assorted bags of chips, 2 of these kettle chips. They were the only 2 bags that were fresh, crisp and edible of the purchase. If Amazon has a weak link it is in their packaging dept. and they should be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received everything immediately which was awesome! However my chips we're placed on the bottom of the box underneath everything else so when I open the box the entire bag is crushed.
customer_reviews.author: EstherJoy :-)

customer_reviews.title: Spicy, but not too hot
customer_reviews.text: Lays lightly salted Jalapeno kettle chips arrived timely and fresh. They have a good crunchy texture, have good flavor, and are spicy, but not too hot. The only problem with Lays chips is that, although delicious, the amount in the bags have shrunk so much that the value has become questionable for the various products.
customer_reviews.author: Junie BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: NEARLY EXPIRED
customer_reviews.text: Bag arrived crushed and nearly expired. Too much trouble to return, we ate them--sort of. Very spicy but no real flavor profile. The coating was plentiful but the crushed, nearly-stale status left me wanting a REAL chip, not pieces...Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Maven

customer_reviews.title: Crunch All You Want
customer_reviews.text: Pretty popular chip in my house. The party-size saves two trips to the store every week. Then too, they EAT more chips!
customer_reviews.author: Elliott A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always disappointed by ‘hot’ or ‘spicy’ snack foods. These are the BEST hot, spicy chips I’ve ever eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Book  Fields

customer_reviews.title: Ordered wrong item
customer_reviews.text: The bags I ordered are sitting in the box they arrived, I ordered them by mistake and since it's pantry I can't return or exchange them. Will have to throw them away because the family don't like them either, they are too too spicy. Well money lost.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie A.

customer_reviews.title: Oh so crunchy
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - these are the best tasting potato chips anywhere. Nothing else even comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Far Left Texas

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Felt like chilli powder on regular chips, wasn't very thrilled with this flavor, was just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Arun

customer_reviews.title: Good kettle chips but not the best....and pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Received crushed kettle chips due to shipping. Fair to good taste. Not too salty. Just not as good as other brands...and pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Mema to two

customer_reviews.title: Best widely-accessible chip on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Lays Kettle Cooked Jalepeno Chips are hands down the best widely-accessibly chips on the market right now. With a crunch that can’t be questioned and perfectly balanced flavor that’ll keep you reaching back into that bag til it’s empty, these are some next level chips. The spice level, which comes in at about a 6/10, gives you enough heat to feel it off the bat, but remains steady as you pop additional chips, never reaching that “too spicy” level that impedes your chip count with some other brands. Whether you’re having a party or just a sad lonely night, the party size is perfectly huge. P.s. I’m usually not a lays guy.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewHead

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Love kettle house chips and to have them delivered helps me out alot
customer_reviews.author: Shawn-Ann Brown

customer_reviews.title: The BEST ! 👍🏼🌝👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Don't take my word for it, try it and you'll see ! 🌝👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Incubus-Nihilist

customer_reviews.title: If you love CRISPY chips then these are for you
customer_reviews.text: These chips don't last long in my house!! If you love CRISPY chips then these are for you! One of my favorites when it comes to chips! The only downfall is it's hard not to eat the whole bag in one sitting (just ask my teenager lol)! They are tasty and have just the right amount of salt !! They go great with a sandwich and/or soup!
customer_reviews.author: Taray116

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: They are crispy with a great flavor. I love them so much, I stomped through the deep snow and gave the extra bags ordered to the neighbor since I couldn't stop eating them.
customer_reviews.author: SRF

customer_reviews.title: these are great chips
customer_reviews.text: lays always makes me smile they are still doing that but these are quite simply that cut above
customer_reviews.author: tim huxoll

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The only other brand of Kettle Cooked Jalapeno clip I ate was much more expensive. This chip is perfectly fine. I will purchase again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Excel

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chip
customer_reviews.text: This is a staple at my house, just can't live without them
customer_reviews.author: Linda Carter

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped with heavy stuff like pop and detergent and got crushed and was all out of the bag in the bottom of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dog hurts bad

customer_reviews.title: Lay's Kettle Chips - Original
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the extra crispy crunch kettle chips provide and these Kettle Cooked Lays did not disappoint. I usually eat the original flavor because I like to get the taste of potato with a hint of salt. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Upset 😤😠😬
customer_reviews.text: It came burst open I was so disappointed I throw it the garbage
customer_reviews.author: Mommy bear😉

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to try them hadnt seen them before. Great taste actually flavored well not just hot for no reason like some of the other flaming products.
customer_reviews.author: Moonspinklady06

customer_reviews.title: Crushed
customer_reviews.text: Box crushed. So were the frosted mini wheats and the chips. The tuna smelled like death and had maghgots on the cans. I'm disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: John Boatman

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and tasty chips.
customer_reviews.text: Can't get enough of the spicy chips. The chips ordered came in a huge bag that I liked. Will be order a lot more of these chips.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: chips are great, i greatly enjoyed them. Only issue was they were toss in a box with other heavy items and were crushed when they got to me
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty chips make the mouth tingle.
customer_reviews.text: Very good chips that are a few tweaks away from being phenomenal. They are great alone or with meals and have a nice kick.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: THESE WERE BOMB ! 💣
customer_reviews.text: These are better than "hot cheetos"/ or any other spicy chip". Sooooo good. 🤣 just hard af. Score 9.5/10 #yummy. Love them on my salad.
customer_reviews.author: 🙋

customer_reviews.title: I love these kettle chips I feel that they are good ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these kettle chips I feel that they are good for me as they are not as greasy as regular chips and not nearly as salty as I am not allowed to have much salt or grease
customer_reviews.author: boopluver

customer_reviews.title: Lays Kettle Cooked Potato Chips
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, delicious snack to have. I may get more later. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Ellen

customer_reviews.title: great flavor with low salt
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Need potassium levels posted in the nutrition labal
customer_reviews.author: C. Stalkup

customer_reviews.title: Quite Tasty Jalapeno Potato Chips
customer_reviews.text: These are made from quality potatoes and the jalapeno seasoning is quite tasty. These are some of the tastier jalapeno kettle chips that I have eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Varela

customer_reviews.title: Crispy and delicious, a must for a movie
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my friend, this is my first time to buy. Before I bought it, my friend told me it was very delicious. With curiosity, I tried to buy a bag of potato chips.I don't know how to share with you the feeling after I finish eating. It is crispy and delicious. What I regret most is that I only bought one package.
customer_reviews.author: Harris frederica63-14

customer_reviews.title: Very good fresh quality chips.
customer_reviews.text: They taste so crisp and not to greasy and not to hot .
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosia

customer_reviews.title: This flavor (sea salt and cracked pepper) is the best flavor and lower in calories than the other flavors
customer_reviews.text: We can't find these in my area so I purchased them on prime pantry. This flavor (sea salt and cracked pepper) is the best flavor and lower in calories than the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely best crunch around! They were gone in one night
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best crunch around! They were gone in one night

customer_reviews.title: Crispy, Crunchy and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These chips were perfect. Crispy, with just the right bite.

customer_reviews.title: Good chips
customer_reviews.text: These are good chips, not nearly so oily as the brand I had purchased before.

customer_reviews.title: Not tasty
customer_reviews.text: The potato chips are hard and it has no taste
customer_reviews.author: Lor

customer_reviews.title: Lay’s Kettle Cooked Chips are a great savings when bought on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Lay’s Kettle Cooked chips, original flavor are a great value. Much less expensive than buying in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Perezsa

customer_reviews.title: Hottie
customer_reviews.text: Idea is good just way too much salt. Were unable to really give the chip justice. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My crack!
customer_reviews.text: These are my crack I tell you! They are not to salty and not to peppery, but just right! I cant even keep them in the house without devouring them in short ordrer. I was pleasantly surprised to find them on here so inexpensive (the same price as sale prices at my local grocer). This might have been an impulse purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Susan r

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: We were really surprised at how good these are. Tasty. Not insanely hot. And they were shipped. It wasn't a bag of dust. We will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: manahtn

customer_reviews.title: Best chips ever
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to find at grocery store. So nice when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Duecker

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!! My entire family loved them so much, they tastes just like takis & hot Cheetos! So delicious! Can’t wait to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chips
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips. The perfect thickness and simple flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted salt and vinegar kettle cooked
customer_reviews.text: I ordered kettle cooked with salt and vinegar Received just plain kettle cooked. Won't order again
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Guerin

customer_reviews.title: Good taste.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good but I feel like it should have a little more flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Sang Kim

customer_reviews.title: Crunch goodness
customer_reviews.text: Crunchy and difficult to resist. Wish there was a “no salt” version. But then I might eat these daily. 🙀

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing! I had to order 2 days in a row because my family loved them. You’ll love them if you love the heat

customer_reviews.title: No sugar + No guilt
customer_reviews.text: All natural ingredients, great taste. Compared to other kettle cooked chips, I’d say these are right up near the top. They are a bit greasier than some of the others, but they are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry M.

customer_reviews.title: A bunch of love in a bag
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting these chips to be as good as they were. They taste sooo good! I could eat them all day. I definitely recommend anyone who likes jalapeno flavored chips to try these.
customer_reviews.author: Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Still so stingy...
customer_reviews.text: I love my kettles but this bag really disappointed me. It was nearly empty when I opened it. A foot high bag and only 4 inches was filled.
customer_reviews.author: Kobster

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy these chips
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these chips. They are crispier than regular potato chips and I love the kettle cooked aspect. They stay fresh for a while and never disappoint. Yummy snack food.
customer_reviews.author: JacMac

customer_reviews.title: Potato Chip
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy them or you'll get hooked. They taste great.
customer_reviews.author: The DUDE

customer_reviews.title: SCRUMPCIOUS
customer_reviews.text: Wish I didn't like them so well; you know you can't eat just one Lay's potato chip and I tend to want to eat the whole bag . . .

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like most other Jalapeño Chips
customer_reviews.text: Love these and was great to be able to order them when the store was out

customer_reviews.title: Asking me to review this is like saying, did you enjoy breathing today?
customer_reviews.text: Asking me to review this is like saying, did you enjoy breathing today? Yes, may I please have some more!!

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack to have
customer_reviews.text: The pepper brings the heat I crave every evening but still Lays is still stingy on every bag they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Kobster

customer_reviews.title: lays is still pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a potato chip with flavor, I would look for any other brand. Over the past three or four years, lays has cut down on the flavor on their potato chips. If you want an original, or plane, potato chips, lays is still pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Reid

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are very crispy. A little too done, but tasty.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Crunchy nut not as flavorful (potato chip) as I thought they would be. Kind of bland.

customer_reviews.title: Great low sodium BBQ chips
customer_reviews.text: On a heart healthy low sodium diet. These foot the bill. Crispy, crunchy and great flavor. 35mg sodium per 18 chips, and get my chip fix, can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Foggy

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Really good chips. My favorite is usually Grandma Utz in the brown bag, but these were just as good and I will order them again.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Chips
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely my favorite chips, delicious with the right amount of jalapeno heat and crunch.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and texture!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh , these are the best ever. I could not stop with one. Out of everything I gave bought here these stand out ! Ordering more ! Ate bag none stop !!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good crunch!
customer_reviews.text: I crush these up and sprinkle them around the trash cans in the house to devert the cockroaches so i have a walking path to the bathroom in the middle of the night

customer_reviews.title: Best chips on the market

product_meta.title: Lay's Kettle Cooked Potato Chips, Original, 8 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Original| Size:Big Bag

LAY’S Kettle Cooked Original Potato Chips are cooked with care in small batches for optimal flavor. It’s the only Kettle Cooked potato chip tasty enough to be called LAY’S. These big bags are great for sharing some delicious fun at home. 






PRODUCT DETAILS
Flavor Name:Original| Size:Big Bag * Package Dimensions :12.8 x 7.8 x 2.8 inches; 8 Ounces
 * Date First Available :November 8, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Frito Lay
 * ASIN :B00TS9L7BA

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars1,902 ratings Flavor Name:Original| Size:Big Bag

LAY’S Kettle Cooked Original Potato Chips are cooked with care in small batches for optimal flavor. It’s the only Kettle Cooked potato chip tasty enough to be called LAY’S. These big bags are great for sharing some delicious fun at home.
feature_bullets: 8.0 oz. bag of LAY'S Classic Potato Chips
Tasty LAY's potato chips are a great snack
Includes three ingredients: potatoes, oil, and salt
